title: Shay Harel Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Shay Harel? Check out all of Shay Harel's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogShay Harel CEO & Founder at Rank Ranger a Similarweb company Shay Harel Shay Harel leads the Search Intelligence solution at Similarweb, following the acquisition of Rank Ranger, where he was previously CEO. Shay is passionate about driving innovation in SEO and digital marketing, continually developing unique data reports that help shape the future of search intelligence. When not advancing the SEO industry, Shay enjoys spending time with his family, strumming his guitar, exploring exotic destinations, and indulging in fine wine from his growing collection.
